content.content: Magicians one and all, I’m exploring an application of ethereum tokens to track the context of any dataset, or document/file, or news article, personal information etc. I’ve written a short article to explain my thinking here: medium.com/codex/context-linking-tokens Would any of you be able to give me some feedback on whether you think this idea has merit, and/or if there are any pitfalls I should consider before I make a formal EIP application. Many thanks! Ajax0
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback on their proposal to use Ethereum tokens to track the context of various types of data. They have provided a link to an article explaining their idea and are seeking input on its merit and potential pitfalls before submitting a formal EIP application. Some constructive criticism and questions are also welcomed.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
